greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest m in range 1..phi(2n+1) such that 10^m == 1 mod 2n+1, or 0 if no such number exists.
program: (PARI) a(n) = {for (m = 1, eulerphi(2*n+1), if (10^m % (2*n+1) == 1, return (m));); return (0);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 14 2013
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _Amarnath Murthy_, May 08 2002
